description: Stores information about Beacon treatment plan preparation orders.

columns.name: OTP_ID
columns.description: The unique identifier for the patient order template record.

columns.name: LINE
columns.description: The line number for the information associated with this record. Multiple pieces of information can be associated with this record.

columns.name: LOT_NUMBER
columns.description: Stores the lot numbers that have been used to prepare this patient order template.

columns.name: PREP_DTTM_DTTM
columns.description: Stores the planned time when this order will be prepared.

columns.name: PREP_ORDER_ID
columns.description: Points to the order that was generated for preparation.
